abstract: Venezuelan Defense Min Vladimir Padrino confirms that military aircraft shot down small plane after crew failed to respond appropriately to authorities; Aruba officials say about 400 packages containing drugs were found in wreckage along with human remains.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela’s defense minister said Friday that Venezuelan military aircraft had shot down a small plane that crashed a day earlier in the waters near the island of Aruba.
snippet: Venezuela’s defense minister said Friday that Venezuelan military aircraft had shot down a small plane that crashed a day earlier in the waters near the island of Aruba.

headline.main: Venezuela: Military Says It Downed Plane Near Aruba
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Military Says It Downed Plane Near Aruba
